name: Melon Seeds Zombie Defense Alpha
description:
Use seeds as ammo to kill zombies, as money to trade with the city for traps and helicopter parts and as seeds to grow melons to survive! Farm, trade, defend,melon.

Melon Seeds Zombie Defense

A zombie defense game but trading, killing and surviving depends on growing watermelons.

Has gamepad support!

Note: Currently, the game is in alpha. This means that I'll be adding so much more to the game very soon and periodically, so please follow @melonzombiegame for updates. Upcoming changes include visual overhaul and more items.

Also your windows might "protect you" from the game, please click "Run anyway." I didn't sign it so windows doesn't trust it. If enough people play that'll be fixed.

For now, trading is disabled. Also probably your save won't transfer to next updates.

Thanks for checking it out and if you like the game you can follow me on @udcgame.

Controls:

WASD to move, F for inventory, R reloads the magazine, and the chest is opened with F closed with Q. Select items from the inventory by pressing E.

1 is gun 2 is watering can 3 is items.

Current mode is survival! Survive as many days as you can! 

Note:

To get water from the well you must equip the watering can by pressing 2.

To eat the watermelons you must press 3 and then select the one from the inventory.
